archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Acquisition
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.1.1.1] The purpose of the Acquisition process is to obtain a product or service in accordance with the acquirer’s requirements.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 140

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.1.1.1] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Beschaffung" ist es, dass der Erwerber ein Produkt oder eine Dienstleistung gemäß seinen Anforderungen erhält".
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.1.1.1] The purpose of the Acquisition process is to obtain a product or service in accordance with the acquirer’s requirements.
